blogPost.excerpt: Fundraising Hours is an effortless office hour event connecting early-stage founders fundraising remotely. The founders can get notified when the investors open their office hours. Powered by Remotehour.
blogPost.body: Fundraising Hours is an effortless office hour event connecting early-stage founders fundraising remotely. The founders can get notified when the investors open their office hours. Powered by Remotehour.
blogPost.title: Fundraising Hours - Remotely connecting founders with committed investors
blogPost.author: Shun Yamada

localize.description: 筹款时间是一项毫不费力的办公时间活动，将早期创始人远程筹款联系起来。当投资者开放办公时间时，创始人可以得到通知。由RemoteHour提供动力。
localize.tagline: 远程连接创始人与忠诚的投资者

localize.description: 籌款時間是一項毫不費力的辦公時間活動，將早期創始人遠程籌款聯繫起來。當投資者開放辦公時間時，創始人可以得到通知。由RemoteHour提供動力。
localize.tagline: 遠程連接創始人與忠誠的投資者

previous.excerpt: Textcraft is a magical utility for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that allows you to transform any text in real-time into a variety of 80+ different formats.
previous.title: Textcraft - Magic text transformations

localize.description: Textcraft是一款适用于iPhone、iPad和Mac的神奇实用程序，允许您将任何文本实时转换为各种80多种不同的格式。
Textcraft是一款適用於iPhone、iPad和Mac的神奇實用程序，允許您將任何文本實時轉換爲各種80多種不同的格式。

next.excerpt: Flow is a collection of pixel-perfect, seamlessly-fitting, ready-made layouts for desktop which helps designers create beatiful designs, faster. Customize every component with one click and design better with Flow!
next.title: Flow Wireframe Kit - The last wireframe kit you will ever need

localize.description: Flow是一个像素完美、无缝贴合、现成的桌面布局集合，可以帮助设计师更快地创建漂亮的设计。一键定制每个组件，使用Flow更好地设计！
localize.tagline: 您需要的最后一个线框套件

localize.description: Flow是一個像素完美、無縫貼合、現成的桌面佈局集合，可以幫助設計師更快地創建漂亮的設計。一鍵定製每個組件，使用Flow更好地設計！
localize.tagline: 您需要的最後一個線框套件
